definitions.definition: In a monotonic manner, pertaining to the Greek system of diacritics which discards the breathings and employs a single accent to indicate stress .
In a monotonic manner, of a function that either never decreases or never increases as its independent variable increases.

main_definition: In a monotonic manner, pertaining to the Greek system of diacritics which discards the breathings and employs a single accent to indicate stress .
secondary_definitions: ( mathematics ) In a monotonic manner, of a function that either never decreases or never increases as its independent variable increases.
